title: D-PLACE dataset derived from Jorgensen 1980 'Western Indians'
description: The Western North American Indians (WNAI) dataset describes cultural practices for 172 societies in Western North America.
citation: Jorgensen, JG. 1980. Western Indians: Comparative Environments, Languages, and Cultures of 172 Western American Indian Tribes. San Francisco: W.H. Freeman and Company.
